divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing outside in the parking lot at work, I noticed the object traveling slowly from the NW traveling toward the SE. The object had what appeared to be 7 lights and was triangular in shape. It made no sound. The apporoximate speed was rather slow, around 2 0- 30 knots. The wind was calm and the weather was slightly overcast. The object was dark with pulsating lights forming different colors. We were not worried and were calm through the experience.
Summary: Triangle shaped craft, moving slowly towards SE
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fordyce
This sighting has never been favorited.
